description:
html/template: define the FuncMap type locally
This redefinition means that the public signature of html/template
does not refer to text/template.

Fixes issue 2546.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6cbf6e1ff658 ***

html/template: define the FuncMap type locally
This redefinition means that the public signature of html/template
does not refer to text/template.

Fixes issue 2546.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5487083

subject: code review 5487083: html/template: define the FuncMap type locally
